summary: This document appears to be a brief email or message confirming the transfer of a box containing four items, including a log book, a packet, a black binder, and a UPS envelope of documentation, from Lt. Doctor to an Associate Warden at MCC New York. The items were provided by Lt. Doctor, who is noted as being out on OWCP (likely Office of Workers' Compensation Programs).

persons.name: Lt. Doctor
persons.context: Provided the box containing four items (log book, packet, black binder, UPS envelope) to the sender; currently out on OWCP (Office of Workers' Compensation Programs).

persons.name: Associate Warden
persons.context: The box containing the four items is being given to the Associate Warden at MCC New York.

connections.description: Lt. Doctor provided documentation to the Associate Warden, indicating a transfer of materials within the MCC New York facility.

events.title: Transfer of documentation
events.description: Confirmation of giving a box containing four items (log book, packet, black binder, UPS envelope) to the Associate Warden at MCC New York.

locations.name: MCC New York
locations.context: Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, where the Associate Warden is located and the documentation is being transferred.

keyFacts: A box containing four items (log book, packet in a six-part folder, black binder, UPS envelope of documentation) was transferred to the Associate Warden at MCC New York.
The documentation was provided by Lt. Doctor, who is currently out on OWCP (Office of Workers' Compensation Programs).
The transfer was confirmed via a message sent from a Verizon Samsung Galaxy smartphone on September 23, 2021.
